get.description: Returns a list of all Agents.

parameters.description:
Return only Agents started by this pmm-agent.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.
parameters.name: pmm_agent_id

parameters.description:
Return only Agents that provide insights for that Node.
Exactly one of these parameters should be present: pmm_agent_id, node_id, service_id.
parameters.name: node_id

parameters.description:

parameters.name: service_id

parameters.description: Return only agents of a particular type.
parameters.name: agent_type

items.description: PMMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node.

runs_on_node_id.description: Node identifier where this instance runs.

connected.description: True if Agent is running and connected to pmm-managed.

items.description:
VMAgent runs on Generic or Container Node alongside pmm-agent.
It scrapes other exporter Agents that are configured with push_metrics_enabled
and uses Prometheus remote write protocol to push metrics to PMM Server.

pmm_agent_id.description: The pmm-agent identifier which runs this instance.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.

status.description:
AgentStatus represents actual Agent status.

 - AGENT_STATUS_STARTING: Agent is starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_INITIALIZATION_ERROR: Agent encountered error when starting.
 - AGENT_STATUS_RUNNING: Agent is running.
 - AGENT_STATUS_WAITING: Agent encountered error and will be restarted automatically soon.
 - AGENT_STATUS_STOPPING: Agent is stopping.
 - AGENT_STATUS_DONE: Agent finished.
 - AGENT_STATUS_UNKNOWN: Agent is not connected, we don't know anything about it's state.
